name: Amazing Snake Go Crawl
description:
Amazing Snake Go Crawl is an addictive new mobile game that combines the classic game of slither snake with elements.
In this game you are a with snake crawl instead of a blob and the goal becomes the biggest and longest slither in the game.
HOW TO PLAY:
- Dont touch worms body.
- Explose the snakes and eat their romains to be large.
- Eject mass to extra speed with the right down Button
